wikipedia_page.main: Angus Buchanan (15 January 1847 – 21 February 1927) was a Scottish international rugby and cricket player. One of the earliest Scottish players, he was capped for Scotland in 1871.

response: * Angus Buchanan (VC) (1894–1944), English recipient of the Victoria Cross
* Angus Buchanan (rugby union) (1847–1927), Scottish international rugby and cricket player
